fields.Name: Form Builders
fields.Description: Integration actions for form builder and survey platforms including Typeform, Google Forms, and JotForm

fields.Name: Typeform
fields.Description: Typeform integration for managing forms, retrieving responses, generating statistics, and automating workflows

fields.Name: JotForm
fields.Description: JotForm integration for managing forms, retrieving submissions, generating statistics, and automating workflows with regional endpoint support

fields.Name: SurveyMonkey
fields.Description: SurveyMonkey integration for enterprise surveys, advanced analytics, audience management, and professional research workflows

fields.Name: Google Forms
fields.Description: Google Forms integration for retrieving form responses, generating statistics, and exporting data. Read-only API integration with Google Workspace.
